puny.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a puny person is small, thin, and weak
puny.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Our efforts look puny beside Fred’s.
puny.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a puny amount of money is too small
puny.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: She was awarded a puny £1,000 in compensation.
